text: Lively atmosphere and great service from the bosses and Wei Ling. Her energy, humour and friendliness made sure we felt comfortable the moment we walked in. It‚Äôs rare to find someone who can balance professionalism with such a genuinely fun and engaging personality, and she absolutely nailed it! Highly recommend this place!

1st time went down with family for my birthday celebration. Boss was very friendly but lady boss keep on pull a long face to we family since we are there, we really don't know what's wrong as it's our first time there? Serving waitress staff are friendly as well. Overall had a wonderful birthday if the lady boss can at least "smile" a little to we customer. Thank you Boss Ah Hai for the well warming welcoming us. üëçüëçüëç
Nice place to Chill and Relax. Bosses and Staffs here are very friendly.
Used to be more happening when the staff were friendly and entertaining. Now with all the new people, service level went down.
Good atmosphere. Best casual karaoke pub in Serangoon area. Staff is nice, customers are kind and easy to make friends
